title: Mini-Ep 118: Room to Groom
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 118: Room to Groom
itunes:subtitle: Kate celebrates her 41st birthday, and Doree celebrates her eyebrows growing in. Then, they hear from listeners about Stratia skincare products, decolonizing our bookshelves, and how to manage hair-shedding and growth when you can’t get a haircut durin...
description:
Kate celebrates her 41st birthday, and Doree celebrates her eyebrows growing in. Then, they hear from listeners about Stratia skincare products, decolonizing our bookshelves, and how to manage hair-shedding and growth when you can’t get a haircut during quarantine. Plus, they offer advice to a listener struggling with a recent separation from their husband.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

  • OXICLEAN - To Work your Magic with OxiClean, go to OxiClean.com/TRYME and order a free sample.
  • FIGS - For 15% off your first purchase from FIGS, go to wearfigs.com and enter promo code FOREVER at checkout.
  • THIRDLOVE - Get 15% off your first purchase when you go to thirdlove.com/forever.
  • MOLEKULE - For 10% off your first order, visit molekule.com and enter FOREVER10 at checkout.
  • BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.
  • In The Bubble Podcast - Listen every Monday AND Wednesday to In the Bubble with Andy Slavitt wherever you get your podcasts.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
